review.title: “GSquared Contract PM”
review.pros: Pros – Leadership has strang targeted company relationships well established in the Atlanta IT marketspace as a basis to align contract opportunities for incoming candidates.
review.cons: Cons – As a small staff augmentation company, typical benefits such as health care, dental, vision, and wellness programs, as well as retirement palnning are not offered, however administrative overhead within the vendor vs employee hourly allocation appears to be inline with biggered more established companies that do offer the full suite.
